meanings.definition: The state or quality of being biracial.
meanings.sent1: Her biracialisms were evident in her unique features.
meanings.sent2: The biracialisms of the twins made it hard to tell them apart.
meanings.sent3: The family reunion showcased a variety of biracialisms.
meanings.sent4: In the painting, the artist captured the biracialisms of the subject beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The author's novel delved into the complexities of biracialisms.

meanings.definition: The presence of characteristics or traits from two different racial backgrounds.
meanings.sent1: The biracialisms in her personality were a blend of cultures.
meanings.sent2: His biracialisms allowed him to connect with a diverse group of people.
meanings.sent3: The recipe combined the biracialisms of two culinary traditions.
meanings.sent4: The music festival celebrated the biracialisms of various artists.
meanings.sent5: The fashion show embraced the biracialisms of different styles.
